ModMetaData.name: PZB Mods - Non-Lethal Weapons
ModMetaData.author: PanzerBjorn
ModMetaData.description:
v0.2 This mod adds a number of non-lethal weapons (less lethal anyway) of varying tech levels in the spirit of the game's design (you must research for access to these new weapons for example).
Adds the following weapons and research options: - Slingshot (Neolothic Ranged Weapon) - Stun Stick (Industrial Melee Weapon) (Currently not working as intended) - Beanbag Gun (Industrial Ranged Weapon) - Riot Rifle (Modern Ranged Weapon) - Riot Rifle Turret - Net Launcher (Modern Rocket Launcher) (Not Yet Implemented) - Zap Rifle (Space Ranged Weapon) - Zap Rifle Turret
